page.title: 07INTERVIEW CRANE DRIVER
page.content:
THIS IS AN INTERVIEW WITH A CRANE DRIVER ON THE QUAY.
1. NAME:{BOB WESTCOTT. 2. WHAT DO THE BOATS USUALLY CARRY: {CLAY AND FERTILISER. 3. ON A BUSY DAY HOW MANY BOATS DO YOU { }LOAD/UNLOAD:{25 DISCHARGE 4. HOW MANY FOREIGN BOATS DO YOU THINK WILL COME AND USE THE PORT THIS YEAR AND SO FAR HOW MANY:{40, SO {FAR ABOUT 16 5. HOW LONG HAVE YOU WORKED ON THE { }QUAY:{20 YEARS ON THE QUAY, 30 {YEARS ON THE RIVER FOR THE COUNCIL. 6. HAS THE WORK INCREASED/DECREASED THROUGH THE YEARS:{STAYED ABOUT THE {SAME. 7. DO YOU THINK THE NEW BRIDGE WILL MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO YOUR WORK: {NO BECAUSE IT IS MEANT TO BE BIG { ENOUGH FOR SHIPS.
